name: Figma Basics
description:
If you're looking for a luxurious and practical addition to your garden or pool area, look no further than the Outdoor Shower from Nivito. This sleek and stylish shower is perfect for rinsing off after a dip in the pool or for enjoying a refreshing shower in the garden on a hot summer's day.

Made from high-quality materials, the Outdoor Shower is built to last. The sturdy frame and weather-resistant finish ensures that it will withstand the elements, whether it's sun, rain, or snow. And for added safety, the shower comes with an anti-slip floor mat.

https://www.nivito.ie
